IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_bank_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_bank_event_log GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_bank_event_log @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT g.id, g.valult_id, g.log_type, g.player_id, ISNULL(c.nickname, N''), g.param1, g.param2, g.log_at FROM dbo.Guild_Bank_Event_Logs AS g LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON g.player_id = c.id WHERE g.guild_id = @guild_id ORDER BY g.log_at ASC
SET NOCOUNT OFF
